attributes.action: Let Families Meet On Eid Day!
attributes.additional_details: Last Year Eid We Spent At Home And That Was Both Eids. This Is A Very Special And Blessed Day For Us As We Fast The Whole Month And Won't Be Able To Spend Time With Each Other And We Respect That And Also Appreciate The Government Acknowledging It But Just As Christmas Families Got To Spend The One Day With Each Other, That's All We Ask For! Just The One Day Please!
attributes.background: Like Everyone Got To Meet One Day On Christmas Day We Want To Be Able To Go And Spend One Day With Our Families As This Is Just As Special As Christmas To All The Muslim Community.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576482
